Text.Page:
Princess Arin's ordered more herbs to create healing draughts for the soldiers, but with all the bears around the lake, I'd be killed!

If you could kill off some {@LinkCreature:23#1#bristleback bears}, I could safely complete my work.

Would you help me? It's for soldiers like you, after all!
With the bears dead or run off, I can fulfill my quota on time. Thanks for your help! I know it was risky work!
